original_text: Then Jesus and his disciples went to visit some villages. They were near to the town of Caesarea Philippi. On the way, Jesus asked his disciples, ‘When people talk about me, who do they say that I am?’
korean_text: 예수와 제자들이 빌립보 가이사랴 여러 마을로 나가실새 길에서 제자들에게 물어 이르시되 사람들이 나를 누구라고 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus and his disciples went to visit some villages.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님과 제자들이 몇몇 마을을 방문하러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were near to the town of Caesarea Philippi.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가이사랴 빌립보 마을 근처에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: On the way, Jesus asked his disciples
who do they say that I am?
